attributes.action: Make Wayne Ledlie stop living a lie and realise that Neil is by far the better backgammon player.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wayne is living in a dream world, constantly telling lies to himself about how good he is at backgammon. I fear for his mental health he needs to made more aware of the situation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
